title: Fix for "call to OpenGL ES api with no current context" that was due to
message:
Fix for "call to OpenGL ES api with no current context" that was due to
OpenGL call made outside the rendering thread (int the native event
    handler functions, called from MoobGLSurface and not
    MoobGLRenderer).
All event handlers are now required to NOT do ANY openGL calls. State
transition (which induces GL calls) is deferred to nativeRenderer
